name: Geometry Box
description:
This is a pretty small game i made in a small period of time but i think it's a pretty cool idea and it can be developed until it's a very good game, but in this case i didn't have any ideas on how to continue. If you rarely want to make a game with this type of mechanics just credit me and it'll be fine.

Developer's Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUF-Jcsn_gxxjqOA1KSFV9w/featured

Editor's Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpvxpCmjrsPZmHA83XBhtoA

Use the comments if you have any feedback to help the developers or if you have any problem. DO NOT send negative messages in the comments.
